title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
table (X:327 Y:40) Interacting with her will start a conversation with her, she is aware you carry the parasite. You will have the following dialogue options.

I'm on a hunt of my own. I'm looking for a druid named Halsin. A hunt? Who's the target? I have my own business to take care of. How do you know I'm a True Soul? I'm on a hunt, too - you're my prey.

Choosing dialogue 5 will commence battle with Minthara. Choosing dialogue 2 and Minthara will say that people who worship a false god are h
